WORK FOR SLEEKNOTE AS A

Video Marketing Intern

Aarhus, Denmark

Apply For This Role

Imagine, for a moment, it’s the first day of your internship.

Your new manager greets you, a gift basket in hand, before walking you to your desk…

You’re introduced to the team and onboarded with short, bite-sized videos made to facilitate fast-learning…

You bond with your fellow interns and colleagues over a delicious homecooked lunch, provided by the company, of course…

From there on, you’re given full responsibility and room to grow—personally and professionally—in areas where your strengths lie.

This isn’t a dream. Nor is it a luxury afforded only to big tech companies like Facebook or Google… 

It’s a typical first day of an internship at Sleeknote.

But don’t take our word for it. Listen to what previous intern applicants—like you—said during their stay:

What Is It Like Being An Intern at Sleeknote?

Why Intern at Sleeknote?

Sleeknote is a software that helps retailers engage their online visitors using intelligent website popups.

With more than 1,800 customers in 47 countries, Sleeknote offers a range of solutions that help e-tailers—like Boozt, Miinto, and Imerco—turn their website visitors into loyal customers.

We’re a fun, vibrant company that employs interesting people from all walks of life and more than half a dozen countries.

If you’re looking for a paid internship… or a program that’s built on boring, recurring work… you won’t find it here.

But if you’re looking for an internship that promises:

  • Ongoing responsibilities for tasks that impact our trajectory;
  • Monthly social events like board game nights;
  • Catered lunches every day; and
  • A glowing recommendation from our CMO. Plus, a potential full-time job with one of more than 200 carefully-chosen partners…

Then keep reading…

Because we have the perfect role for you.

Want to Become Sleeknote’s Next Video Intern?

We’re looking for a video marketing intern with a passion for all things video marketing-related.

During this internship, you’ll work closely with our marketing team and learn how to:

  • Capture quality video both in the office and at our customers’ offices as projects dictate;
  • Shoot and edit content to build a library of product videos, hiring videos, and/or case study videos;
  • Develop an intimate understanding of our brand message and tone to accurately capture in video and photo form;
    And more.

To be successful, you must have a flair for creativity, an eye for detail, and a ridiculously good work ethic. The program starts in August 2021 in Aarhus, Denmark, and runs for five to six months depending on your course requirements.

How Do I Apply?

To apply for the position, and become part of the Sleeknote family, click “Apply”

If you have any questions about the job, feel free to contact Emil (CMO) at ek@sleeknote.com.

Apply

Value #1

We Iterate to Success

Success isn’t a straight line. We acknowledge our mistakes and learn from them to move us closer to where we want to go.

Value #2

We Encourage Growth

We invite employees to become the best version of themselves, both personally and professionally.

Value #3

We Go The Extra Mile

It’s easy to settle for mediocrity. We believe in going above and beyond, whether that’s solving internal challenges or serving our customers.

What We’re All About

Sleeknote helps your favorite e-commerce brands engage website visitors—without hurting the user experience. When we founded Sleeknote in 2014, there were several lead generation tools on the market. But few, if any, gave savvy e-commerce marketers the flexibility to engage their site visitors on their terms. We like to think we changed that.
